testcase.classname: Generating the 10 numbers of order id from adactin hotel application
testcase.name: Generating Order id
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Adactin hotel app page on chrome browser...................passed When User enters the "Maddy0302" and "maddy@0302"...........................passed And User should click the login button......................................passed When User select "Melbourne","Hotel Sunshine","Deluxe","1 - One","24/04/2022","25/04/2022","1 - One","0 - None".passed And Click continue button...................................................passed When User select Hotel and click continue for booking.......................passed When User enter "Mathan","Kumar","Chennai","1234432156788765","VISA","June","2022","345".passed And User click on continue for generating order id..........................passed Then User print order id in the console.....................................passed
